entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 60 near the water. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
